summary: Nanni Moretti takes a comic look at the ebbs and flows of his life as he becomes a father for the first time. He struggles with distractions while trying to make a documentary of the Italian national elections.
cast: Nanni Moretti|Silvio Orlando|Silvia Nono|Pietro Moretti|Agata Apicella Moretti|Nuria Schoenberg|Silvia Bonucci|Quentin de Fouch√©cour|Renato De Maria|Claudio Francia|Jacopo Francia|Matilde Francia|Daniele Luchetti|Giovanna Nicolai|Nicola Piepoli|Corrado Stajano|Alessandro Pesci
title: Abril
